meanings.definition: Made by chemical synthesis, especially to imitate a natural product.
meanings.sent1: The synthetic fabric felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The company produced synthetic diamonds for industrial use.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat made of synthetic material.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as synthetic as the artificial flowers in the vase.
meanings.sent5: The synthetic scent of fresh laundry filled the room.
